examples.example: 我精心挑选了一个漂亮的本子用来记录每天的美好点滴。

translate.english: I carefully selected a beautiful notebook to record the beautiful details of every day.

examples.example: 我把重要的知识点都记在这个本子上，它真是我的好帮手。

translate.english: I have recorded all the important knowledge points in this notebook, and it is really a good helper of mine.

examples.example: 我将生活中的点滴感悟认真地写在本子上，它成了我的珍贵回忆宝库。

translate.english: I carefully write down every bit of perception in life in the notebook, and it has become my precious treasure trove of memories.
